name: elfish
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or like an elf (= an imaginary magical being in stories, often like a small person with pointed ears): She was a small woman with a round, elfish face. She has an elfish air and dashes about energetically. These strange elfish creatures were friends with the giants. Synonym
elvishRelated word
elfCompare
elfin
More examplesFewer examplesAn elfish man with light brown hair opened the door.She winked at me in an elfish manner before answering.He had a thin, somewhat elfish face with big round eyes.A little old lady was selling elfish cloaks and magical potions.
